item.description:
We plan to do a banner wave on Route 1 at both the Main Street/Saugus and Essex Street/Saugus overpasses. We're starting at 7:00 a.m. on Thursday, October 18th at Main Street. Less than one mile south is the Essex Street / Saugus overpass on Route 1.

IT WOULD BE EXCELLENT TO HAVE A GOOD TURNOUT ON BOTH OVERPASSES ON ROUTE 1 THE SAME MORNING-Thursday, October 18th just like we did on October 11th.

The repetition of seeing the sign twice, about a mile apart, is very strong memorability factor. It reinforces the name Ron Paul for President.

Please join Don Stacey, Carl Kelly, Kevin and Stephanie to do this team work banner wave. We will cover Don Main St. and the Essex Street overpass.

Another factor is that there is likely a large number of commuters travelling south from NH, and also there is nearly always a backup on Route 1 between the hours of 7 and 9 a.m., which gives them plenty of time to ponder the Ron Paul for President 2008 sign!
item.name: Route 1 Sign Wave for Ron Paul
